items.sentence: Tom asked Mary to repeat what she had just said.
Even the optimists agree that it won\'t be easy.
Everybody wants to know what\'s going to happen.
I just think you should be careful, that\'s all.
Does anybody here have an umbrella I can borrow?
I\'m going to be meeting Tom\'s parents tonight.
Why do you always have to overcomplicate things?
Tom asked Mary what she thought the problem was.
Tom hid behind a bush so Mary wouldn\'t see him.
All things considered, I\'d rather be in Boston.
Both Tom and Mary don\'t speak French very well.
Tom and Mary have stopped talking to each other.
Tom and Mary have the same color socks on today.
I take a walk before breakfast almost every day.
I want to know where I can buy a hat like yours.
Tom didn\'t look like he was having a good time.
Tom didn\'t mention where he was planning to go.
Tom didn\'t notice that Mary was staring at him.
I can\'t do that, not under these circumstances.
Where do you want to go on your summer vacation?
Which bottle of wine do you want to drink first?
How are we going to do this without Tom\'s help?
How did Tom know he wasn\'t supposed to do that?
I asked Tom to help me pull weeds in the garden.
You didn\'t want Tom to know the truth, did you?
Everyone knows Tom and I don\'t like each other.
Tom isn\'t really going to eat that frog, is he?
Why don\'t you ask Tom to introduce you to Mary?
Mary is Tom\'s daughter from his first marriage.
All the boys in Mary\'s class think she\'s cute.
Tom certainly knows what he should be doing now.
You should\'ve paid attention to Tom\'s warning.
Do you think Tom would\'ve wanted us to do that?
Tom asked Mary to stop doing what she was doing.
I just saw Tom entering the principal\'s office.
All of my children want to go to Boston with me.
I can\'t tell if you\'re being sarcastic or not.
When Tom entered the room, Mary stopped talking.
When did you notice that your umbrella was gone?
I asked Tom to help me clean up after the party.
Tom says that he\'s too busy to help Mary today.
I can show you around town if you\'d like me to.
I can swim now, but I couldn\'t three years ago.
I can\'t afford to buy the computer that I want.
The police searched Tom\'s room for three hours.
Tom has lived in Boston for quite some time now.
You\'re not supposed to wear lipstick at school.
Tom doesn\'t play tennis as often as he used to.
Tom and Mary were married for a very short time.
I\'m going to a conference in Boston next month.
You\'re definitely the best French speaker here.
You\'re not leaving Australia for good, are you?
Tom was the one that drove Mary to the hospital.
Tom rides the bus to school every day with Mary.
I know both Tom and Mary have agreed to do that.
I know both Tom and Mary have to leave tomorrow.
I know that Tom and Mary have both been injured.
Do you think Tom and Mary are too young to date?
Do you think Tom and Mary will do that together?
Do you think Tom has any idea why Mary did that?
Didn\'t you know Tom and I had to do that alone?
Please make sure you get to the station on time.
Please take off your shoes before coming inside.
Don\'t you want to hear what Tom said about you?
Tom told me that Mary used to be his girlfriend.
Tom certainly did everything we asked him to do.
Tom certainly does a good job cleaning chimneys.
Tom vowed never to set foot in that place again.
I\'m certain Tom will do what he says he\'ll do.
I don\'t think that Tom really plans to do that.
I don\'t think that Tom will be able to do that.
I don\'t think you should borrow money from Tom.
Tom wasn't the only one who knew how to do that.
Tom's ex-wife and Mary's ex-husband got married.
Tom's love of the outdoors isn't shared by Mary.
You can tell by Tom's accent that he's Canadian.
You don't seem to be as calm as Tom seems to be.
You don't seem to be as conscientious as Tom is.
Tom warned Mary that that would probably happen.
Tom was the last student to leave the classroom.
Tom started crying and Mary started crying, too.
Tom told me that Mary would be ready to do that.
The president is flying into town by helicopter.
Is Tom the only one here who doesn't have a dog?
That's not the sort of thing that we like to do.
Don't you have better things to do this morning?
I fell and broke my some bones in my right hand.
School doesn't end today. We have one more week.
Tom is supposed to meet me in the lobby at 2:30.
Did you meet anyone new at the party last night?
You're the one who did that for Tom, aren't you?
You're the only one who was supposed to do that.
You're the first person to ever ask me for help.
You're lucky nobody saw you do that, aren't you?
You're likely the only person who can't do that.
You're not permitted to do that in this country.
Tom was able to understand everything Mary said.
Tom told me he was going to ask Mary to do that.
You can do anything, if you put your mind to it.
Tom asked me what my favorite kind of music was.
